class.name: eiriarm_controllers/GravityCompensationController
class.description: Gravity Compensation Controller using Pinocchio dynamics. Computes and applies gravity torques g(q) to compensate for gravitational effects.

class.name: eiriarm_controllers/JointImpedanceControllerPlugin
class.description: Joint Impedance Controller with Gravity Compensation using Pinocchio. Implements: tau = g(q) + Kp*(qd-q) + Kd*(vd-v) Supports per-joint gains and real-time target command updates.
